body_html: Consider an identity matrix where SVD reduces to eigendecomposition. Every vector is an eigenvector. You have to pick a single output vector in order to be able to backprop through it, but because all choices are equally valid, the backprop is not defined.
body_text: Consider an identity matrix where SVD reduces to eigendecomposition. Every vector is an eigenvector. You have to pick a single output vector in order to be able to backprop through it, but because all choices are equally valid, the backprop is not defined.
body: Consider an identity matrix where SVD reduces to eigendecomposition. Every vector is an eigenvector. You have to pick a single output vector in order to be able to backprop through it, but because all choices are equally valid, the backprop is not defined.
